## assocMap() function

Reducer accepting key-value pairs / tuples and transforming / adding them to an ES6 Map.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function assocMap<A, B>(): Reducer<Map<A, B>, Pair<A, B>>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`Reducer<Map<A, B>, Pair<A, B>>`
